DOC.brief_summary: Aim study evaluate clinical , morphometric non invasive instrumental evaluation activity `` anticellulitis '' cosmetic product v reference product market ( comparison within subject ) , apply day , uninterrupted period 4 week , 22 female healthy volunteer low/moderate oedematous - fibrosclerotic lipodystrophy thigh . It also aim study evaluate cosmetic acceptability volunteer product efficacy tolerance investigator volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Activity Pharmacological `` Anticellulitis '' Product vs. Reference Product Market
